amendatorysection.catchline: Streets; improvements; control of work; rules and regulations.
amendatorysection.para: The city shall have the right to control and direct all work upon the public streets. The city may adopt any and all reasonable regulations relating to excavations in the streets or public grounds by any and all parties, including waterworks, gas, and other franchised corporations or public contractors and to enforce such regulations and impose such penalties for the violation thereof as may be deemed proper.
